actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Government and people of the United States reaffirm support for the well-being and independence of the Republic of Tunisia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Government and people of the United States reaffirm their friendship for and express their support for the continuing independence of Tunisia.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Government and people of the United States reaffirm support for the well-being and independence of the Republic of Tunisia.
